code: const quizQuestions10th=[{question:"Which subjects did you perform best in?",options:["Mathematics","Science","Social Studies","Languages"]},{question:"What was your overall academic performance?",options:["Excellent","Good","Average","Needs improvement"]},{question:"Which subject do you find easiest to understand?",options:["Math problems","Science concepts","Business ideas","Arts and literature"]},{question:"What activity do you enjoy the most?",options:["Solving puzzles","Doing experiments","Planning or organizing","Drawing or writing"]},{question:"What type of topics interest you?",options:["Technology","Medicine or science","Business","Creative fields"]},{question:"Which activity would you choose in free time?",options:["Coding or logical games","Science videos","Business news","Art or music"]},{question:"What kind of career excites you?",options:["Technology-based","Healthcare-based","Business-based","Creative-based"]},{question:"Which skill best describes you?",options:["Logical thinking","Observation","Communication","Creativity"]},{question:"How do you solve problems?",options:["Analyze step by step","Experiment and observe","Discuss and plan","Think creatively"]},{question:"Which skill do you want to improve further?",options:["Technical skills","Scientific knowledge","Business skills","Creative skills"]}];export default quizQuestions10th;
